resources.string:
Hello, I’m Cuong. 
 
 I’m 21 years old and I’m a freshman at the University of Engineering And Technology. 
 My major is Math and Physics. Now I live in Hanoi city, the capital of Vietnam. 
 
 
 
 
 This is my first time I lived far from my family, so I find it very excited to discover new things. 
 I’m a great fan of soccer and I always spend my time playing soccer with my friends, at least once a week. 
 I’m a generous and easy-going person, but when it comes to work I’m a competitive perfectionist.
